text: The neurovault download stops if too many images fail to be downloaded in a row, so that it doesn't continue trying if there is no internet connection, for example. The current value for max fails in a row is 10 but this is far too optimistic; it's actually likely to find 10 bad images in a row (in the cases I've seen, it's metadata referencing files that don't exist). I suggest we allow 500 failures instead.
title: increase threshold for stopping dl in neurovault
